title: THIS IS WHY YOU WANT A SNOW PUSHER. #tractors #snowremoval #madeincanada

tasks.task: Install and use a snow removal attachment on a tractor.
subtasks: Research and select the KISS principle snow removal attachment for the tractor.
Operate the tractor equipped with the snow removal attachment.
Clear snow using the HLA pusher attachment, handling various snow types and depths.
Maneuver the pusher to direct snow away from structures like retaining walls, garage doors, or parked cars.
Replace wear points as necessary for maintenance.
Compare cost-effectiveness of the pusher to other options like plows or snow blowers.

tasks.task: Operate a fully enclosed back drag feature on the snow removal attachment.
subtasks: Activate and use the fully enclosed back drag to push snow forward.
Position the pusher in the forward position to utilize the back drag.
Continue using the tractor and attachment to properly manage and remove accumulated snow.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Install and use a snow removal attachment on a tractor.

Operate a fully enclosed back drag feature on the attachment, which involves activating the back drag and positioning the pusher forward. Tasks are broken down into step-by-step operations a person would perform. **Answer**
MAINTASK: Install and use a snow removal attachment on a tractor.
Operate a fully enclosed back drag feature on the snow removal attachment.
